entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 7:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
